misc.title: #ONEPIECE1175 My prediction for next chapter(write below your guys prediction): - Loki Dragon form full panel(with devilfruit name) - DF lore and in general Elbaph lore about that df - Imu reaction to
misc.text: #ONEPIECE1175 My prediction for next chapter(write below your guys prediction): - Loki Dragon form full panel(with devilfruit name) - DF lore and in general Elbaph lore about that df - Imu reaction to it - Sommers steps back and goes up - Zoro and the giants gets pushed by the Demon Giant army leaded by Dorry and Brogy - Luffy and Loki face them, we see a panel with Luffy and Loki preparing to fight Dorry and Brogy(maybe they even show some feats). - Defeat of the Demon Giant army after Luffy and Loki wrecked them - they move forward to Imu,Kilingham and Sommers(who is on his way to Imu too).

items.text: #ONEPIECE1175 My prediction for next chapter(write below your guys prediction): - Loki Dragon form full panel(with devilfruit name) - DF lore and in general Elbaph lore about that df - Imu reaction to it - Sommers steps back and goes up - Zoro and the giants gets pushed by the Demon Giant army leaded by Dorry and Brogy - Luffy and Loki face them, we see a panel with Luffy and Loki preparing to fight Dorry and Brogy(maybe they even show some feats). - Defeat of the Demon Giant army after Luffy and Loki wrecked them - they move forward to Imu,Kilingham and Sommers(who is on his way to Imu too).
